article_title: Jesse Jackson launches voter registration drive in Myrtle Beach
article_text:
Civil rights activist wants to sign up 100,000 new voters by spring

Jackson praises racial progress, but says state’s leaders should do more to help poor

Jackson’s Rainbow Push Coalition opening offices in Greenville, Columbia and Charleston

article_metadata.title: Jesse Jackson launches voter registration drive in Myrtle Beach | The State

og.description: Hailing the era of “a new South,” the Rev. Jesse Jackson praised the region’s racial progress during a stop in the Myrtle Beach area Friday.
